tasks.task: Setting up an off-grid garden irrigation system
subtasks: Obtaining necessary components (solar panels, charge controller, well pump, drip system components)
Connecting solar panels to charge controller and battery
Installing pressure gauge on the irrigation system
Setting up drip system with drip tape and testing for proper flow
Adapting to higher-than-expected system pressure by considering a pressure regulator
